title: Robobros
description: First time trying out React - just playing around during a course with a free API. At this point this is so old it could be called legacy code.

title: Matchoji
description: Goofy half-completed mobile game I worked on with a friend for fun - we wanted to see how easy it was to replicate all those low effort games from ads.

title: Recipe Book
description: Recipe app done in Angular with a Firebase BE: Auth, Recipe management, shopping list.
